{{Description|"If seeds wither apart from soil, they will remain a single seed. But if returned to the soil, they shall multiply ten-fold."}}
'''Vijnana-Phala Mine''' is [[Tighnari]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|3.5}}
* The Vijnana Suffusion effect is depicted by the seeds floating around Tighnari's left shoulder. They will disappear as Tighnari shoots Wreath Arrows, or when the Vijnana Suffusion effect ends.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|Origins Known From the Stem}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Comprehension Amidst the Flowers}}
